name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Frontend Developer with 13+ years of experience specializing in high-performance web applications. Proficient in **TypeScript**, **React**, **Next.js**, **CSS**, **HTML**, and **Node.js**, with a strong focus on implementing **micro frontends** and **web components**. Experienced in utilizing **CI/CD pipelines** and **infrastructure-as-code** solutions using **Pulumi** and **Terraform**, as well as **Azure DevOps** to enhance development workflows. Adept at employing unit testing frameworks to ensure code quality and reliability.

Demonstrated success in the healthcare and financial industries, with expertise in building AI/ML-powered platforms that leverage predictive analytics and real-time processing. Possess a robust understanding of compliance standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS, aligning development with security best practices. Strong problem-solving and communication skills, enabling effective collaboration and project delivery.

experience.responsibilities:
• Developed dynamic and responsive user interfaces using **TypeScript**, **React** (17–18), and **Next.js**, adhering to best practices in web page security and micro frontends.
• Collaborated on **CSS** and **HTML** standards to ensure consistent styling and layout across applications, enhancing overall user experience.
• Designed and implemented **CI/CD pipelines** with **Azure DevOps** and **Terraform**, streamlining deployment processes and improving release cycles by **30%**.
• Integrated infrastructure-as-code practices with **Pulumi**, ensuring robust environment setup and compliance with security protocols on the **Azure Portal**.
• Executed comprehensive unit testing strategies utilizing unit testing frameworks, ensuring quality through automated testing with tools such as Jest and Cypress.
• Participated in effective problem-solving sessions, enhancing communication skills to articulate technical needs and challenges across teams.
• Mentored junior developers on frontend best practices and modern technologies, contributing to skill development and team growth.
• Managed continuous interaction with backend services via **Node.js** and **NPM**, ensuring smooth data flow and efficient service integration.
• Developed modular components leveraging **web components**, enhancing the reusability and maintainability of frontend codebases.
• Ensured compliance with latest web standards and security protocols, maintaining high-performance applications in a fast-paced environment.

• Developed robust, responsive web applications using **TypeScript**, **React (18)**, **Next.js**, and **CSS**, ensuring adherence to web standards and accessibility best practices.
• Implemented micro frontends architecture to improve scalability and maintainability of applications, leveraging **Node.js** and **NPM** for efficient package management.
• Ensured high-quality code through unit testing frameworks, enhancing reliability and reducing bugs in production by **30%**.
• Designed visually appealing user interfaces utilizing **Tailwind CSS** and **HTML** for optimal user experiences across financial platforms and admin panels.
• Collaborated on CI/CD pipelines using **Azure DevOps**, streamlining deployment processes and improving release frequency by **40%**.
• Applied infrastructure-as-code principles using **Terraform** and **Pulumi** to automate and secure web application deployments on **Azure Portal**.
• Conducted thorough security reviews and implemented best practices for **web page security** and **Azure portal security**, mitigating vulnerabilities by **25%**.
• Demonstrated exceptional problem-solving abilities and communication skills while working in cross-functional teams to deliver project goals efficiently.

• Developed interactive and engaging web applications using **TypeScript**, **React** (18), and **Next.js**, ensuring optimal performance and maintainability across multiple projects.
• Built responsive and accessible e-commerce UIs, utilizing **HTML5/CSS3** and optimized for mobile-first design and WCAG 2.1 compliance.
• Implemented CI/CD pipelines with **Azure DevOps** for streamlined development processes and rapid deployment of features, enhancing collaboration and reducing time-to-market by up to **30%**.
• Employed **NPM** for managing project dependencies and ensuring up-to-date library versions for all frontend components.
• Integrated **micro frontends** architecture for scalability, enabling independent deployment of frontend applications and reducing the regression testing overhead.
• Enhanced application security by applying **infrastructure-as-code** principles using **Pulumi** and **Terraform**, ensuring consistent environment setups and stringent security policies.
• Developed modular **web components** to promote code reuse and improve team productivity by reducing duplicated efforts across projects.
• Applied unit testing frameworks to achieve over **80% code coverage**, ensuring high-quality, bug-free deliverables with rigorous testing protocols.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams to align project objectives and requirements, showcasing strong **communication skills** and effective problem-solving abilities to address challenges promptly.
